steps.name: Given  I make a booking from "Dublin" to "Wroclaw" on 12/03/2018 for 2 adults and 1 child
When  I pay for booking with card details "5555 5555 5555 5557", "10/18" and "265"
Then  I should get payment declined message

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Get declined message of failed payment

labels.name: package
labels.value: Get declined message of failed payment

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Get declined message of failed payment
